devdoc.details: Supports a single token pair with add/remove liquidity and swap functions

params.amountA: Amount of token A to add
params.amountB: Amount of token B to add

params.amountIn: Amount of token to swap in
params.tokenIn: Address of token to swap in

returns.amountOut: Estimated amount of token to receive

returns.sharePercentage: User's percentage of pool (in basis points, e.g., 1000 = 10%)

params.liquidityAmount: Amount of liquidity shares to burn

params.amountIn: Amount of token to swap in
params.tokenIn: Address of token to swap in

devdoc.title: SimpleDEX

userdoc.notice: A simplified decentralized exchange using constant product AMM (x * y = k)
